mutants.code:
from heapq import heapify, heapreplace

def minimal_fret_difference(a, n, b):
    a.sort(reverse=True)
    res = float('inf')
    heap = [(b[i] - a[0], i) for i in range(n)]
    heapify(heap)
    m = max(b) + a[0]
    count = [0] * n
    while True:
        (v, i) = heap[0]
        res = min(res, m - v)
        count[i] += 1
        if count[i] == 6:
            break
        t = b[i] - a[count[i]]
        m = max(m, t)
        heapreplace(heap, (t, i))
    return res

        count[i] += 1
        if count[i] == 6:
            break
        t = b[i] - a[count[i]]
        m = max(m, t)
        heapreplace(heap, (t, i))
    return res
